RT Coaching | Pedagogy informed coaching

Helping children, students and teens learn to play sport. We work with schools and sports organisations focusing on various sports including football, tag rugby and multi sports.

Using pedagogy informed coaching to provide a fully holistic experience for everyone involved.
Whether it is holistic coaching or technical improvement required, we have the approach to fit the scenario.
Fully inclusive, everyone is welcome.
What are you waiting for....... Book now

Sports

We cover a variety of sports which change termly. We currently are running the following programs:

Football

We offer football coaching at afterschool clubs in and around Surrey. Allow our FA qualified coaches to do what they do best!

  • Times and pricing
  • Year 3/4: Monday 15.15-16.15pm
  • Year 5/6: Tuesday 15.15-16.15pm
  • £9 per session *Book 10 sessions for £80
Book

Tag rugby

We offer tag-rugby coaching at afterschool clubs in and around Surrey. Most of the fun and skills involved with rugby, without the contact

  • Times and pricing
  • Year 3/4:Wednesday 15.15-16.15pm
  • Year 5/6:Thursday 15.15-16.15pm
  • £9 per session *Book 10 sessions for £80
Book

Multi sports

We offer multi sports coaching at afterschool clubs in and around Surrey. This focuses on various themes: Invasion, wall & net, striking/fielding, target and alternative activities.

  • Times and pricing
  • Year 3/4: Friday 15.15-16.15pm
  • Year 5/6:Friday 15.15-16.15pm
  • £9 per session *Book 10 sessions for £80
Book

Services

Whether you are a an individual, a parent/carer of an individual or an organisation (E.G: such as a school or sports team) we have something to offer..

If content is king, then context is god (Gates, 1996)

At Rt Coaching we promote a pedagogy first approach. This means that we tailor content as much as possible to the situation.
We combine planning and reflection after each session to assess the best course of action for future episodes.

Using detailed knowledge of coaching and teaching padagogy. We base planning around Mosston (1966) spectrum of teaching styles/Pill., et al (2021) adaptation for sports coaching.
The same way a builder would use different tools for different jobs. Our pedagogy first approach allows us to offer our students more than just your every day after-school club.
below are more details of the services we provide.
Please have a look of yourself and let us know if you have any questions!

How can we benefit you or your organisation?

Please see below for details on our services. We have a range of serices available to meet your needs.

We offer coaching sessions using our pedagogy first approach. This involves using different pedagogies to ensure progress is consistent, whilst also ensuring that it is fun for everyone involved. We are fully inclusive and everyone is welcome to join our sessions. We currently offer football, tag-rugby and multi-sports. However, this is subject to change, as we endeavour to meet the needs of our players and students.
Whether you are an individual, parent of a child, school or sports organisation. We have something to offer! Book now

We have extensive knowledge of the UK national curriculum for all key stages. We endeavour to produce high quality PE lessons centered around our pedagogy first approach . Aligning with the UK national curriculum. We do this through a varied approach, encompassing a holistic, task-oriented approach that ensures our lessons are as productive as they are fun!
Pedagogy is about how we teach and our approach ensures that students are in good hands.
Please get in touch if you are interested in RT Coaching and the services we provide.Book now

We offer 1-1 sessions with our experienced, qualified coaches. To drive your performance to the next level. We start by looking at things you are doing well and build on these. Whilst also, looking for areas to improve and working on these as well. This dynamic individualised approach is potentially what you need to take your game to the next level. Whether it be technical, tactical, physical or another area that needs addressing. We have the answer! Please contact us to book your 1-1 session now. Book now
